name.value: TDD-1 - Intro - 01 - Basic - 03 - Create - Patient with Search - XML

description.value: Test use of fixtures with a Patient create in XML format using a static fixture. Search for the created Patient using values from the static fixture.

Create a Patient in XML format using a static fixture. The expected response code is 201 (Created). The response payload may contain the created Patient resource or an OperationOutcome resource in XML format.
Create a Patient in XML format using a static fixture
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 201(Created).
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Location is present.

Search for the created Patient in XML format using family, given, gender and birthDate parameters. The expected response code is 200 (OK). The response payload is expected to be a Bundle searchset resource containing a single entry with the found Patient in XML format.
Search for the created Patient in XML format
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the response payload contains the Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 entry. Warning only to account for potential duplicate Patient creations.
